REQUEST:

What is the average price of 2010 Toyotas having mileage below 50k?
["FT.AGGREGATE", "cars", "@Make:{Toyota} @Year:[2010 2010] @Mileage:[-inf (50000]", "GROUPBY", "0", "REDUCE", "AVG", "1", "@Price"]

REQUEST:
